reviewText: Malcolm and the evil Kilokahn have finally tracked down Servo. Kilokahn has ordered Malcolm to strand up Christmas lights to pin point him. When Kilokahn finds out that Sam Collins is Servo he tries to destroy him. Kilokahn turns on Malcolm and tries to destroy him as well. Now Sam and Malcolm now have to work together after secretly being enemys all along. Servo now has to defeat Kilokahn in a finale battle but his team mates the vitle, bore, and tractor program a.k.a. Sydney,Tanker,and Amp who help to become more powerful. Note:the two episodes on this tape were the two last in the series. So if your a Superhuman Samurai Syber Squad fan then this is the tape to get.
